column1: Narrator : The island is small, flat and green.
Narrator : On the beach, a sign reads : « Armory, Metal & Leather shop, follow the road »

column2: Choice : Show me what you got! (trade)
column3: Choice : Have you heard about NOMTRESOR?
column10: Choice : Tell me about the ocean !

column3: OtherSpeak : The only people interested in this are going to DIRECTIONTOFORMULA, that's all I know.
column4: OtherSpeak : Nope, never heard about it, sorry!
column11: OtherSpeak : I’d prefer we talk business only

column8: OtherSpeak : Pirates come here for winter clothes.
column13: Narrator : The armorer is laying on the floor, dead.
